data.price: 1. Markuu yimaado Gargaarka Alle iyo guusha (Furashada Makkah).
2. Oo aad aragto dadka oo u soo galaya diinta Alle (Islaamka) rac-rac (kooxo),
data.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan

data.price: 3. Markaas ku tasbiixso Ammaanaha Rabbigaa, weydiisona Denbi Dhaaf. Hubaal Alle waa Toobad aqbal Badane.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
